description:
An extendable sling for wandering routes or to use in the alpine. The single-strand sling is lighter than it's round counterpart, and you can shorten it by clipping a carabiner to the other end.

  • Dyneema is light has a high strength-to-weight ratio, and is more abrasion resistant and absorbs less water than nylon
  • 120cm sling can be shortened to 60cm or 30cm
name: Mammut Alpine Trad Sling
